heroDescription: A clean, intuitive wallet built to help you store, send, and swap tokens — without complexity.
features_title: One convenient interface tailored for you
multi_chain_description: Seamlessly manage Ethereum and other chains without switching.
watch_addresses_description: Monitor wallets without private keys, keeping your funds safe.
nfts_description: See your collections, access market data, & trade.
l2_tokens_activity_description: All the L2s Tokens, activity details, and NFTs for the L2s that matter.
impersonation_mode_description: Use any wallet in read-only mode with just an address.
hardware_wallets_description: Do anything with Ledger & Trezor from Rainbow.
big_card_1_title: Get notified about what matters most
big_card_1_description: Know what happens the instant it’s confirmed onchain. Customize the alerts you receive, from the type of transaction to the individual wallets you watch.
big_card_2_title: Find the money that might be waiting for you
big_card_2_description: See and accept all of your NFT offers inside Rainbow.
support_description: Need help? Reach out to us!
faq_a1: Raylac is a secure and user-friendly Ethereum crypto wallet available on the Play Store and Apple Store.
faq_a2: Raylac supports multiple blockchains, including Ethereum, Polygon, BNB Chain, and more.
faq_a3: You can download Raylac from the Google Play Store or Apple App Store.
faq_a4: Yes! Raylac is completely free to download and use.
faq_q5: How can I secure my wallet?
faq_a5: Always keep your seed phrase private and enable security features within Raylac.
